Question
========
In Boelen and van den Hout's article, The Role of Threatening Misinterpretations and Avoidance in Emotional Problems After Loss (2008), they write the following sentence (from Statistical analyses): 'As recommended by Aiken and West, in all regression analyses, predictors were centred to reduce ....'. What should be filled in to complete the sentence correctly?

Answerlist
----------
* Heteroscedasticity.
* Multicollinearity.
* Homoscedasticity.
* Linearity.


Solution
========
Centering the predictors is one way to reduce multicollinearity.
